general.description: In this section, you’ll find a detailed overview of my professional journey, highlighting key roles I’ve held in software development and system architecture. This section showcases my main achievements, relevant projects, and the technical skills I’ve gained and applied in each position, providing a clear view of my growth as a senior developer and my contributions in collaborative, high-performance environments.

summary.name: Diovi Robinet Morales
summary.description: Learning new technologies is one of the professional challenges that I like the most. Soccer and chess are other of my passions. I enjoy good music and going for a run in the afternoon in my free time.
